markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[None Shall Know](/Feats.aspx?ID=2842) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you. You gain [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) as an innate occult spell once per day, which can only be cast on yourself and is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.
name: None Shall Know
